sub_title: Urban Planning Specialist | Business Analyst| B.A. | R Language | Python | GIS | Data Analyst
summary:
> I am a trained architect and urban planner, but I have been transitioning to the field of data since 2016 
 with my master's and doctoral studies. I am highly specialized in urban analysis and have over 8 years 
 of experience in research for real estate, planning, and urban development. However, I can work with 
 analysis from various business areas.

> I have participated in innovative research on sustainable housing developments and collaborative 
 management through an application to improve community relations and ensure collaborative 
 management. Currently, I am incorporating machine learning for predictive scenario building for 
 development.

> I have a good understanding of how to extract information from people through briefing techniques 
 to assist in designing business problems that can be solved with the help of data. I use programming 
 languages like Python, R, SQL, and spatial data analysis to analyze data.

> As someone who views learning as a continuous skill and is always curious, I continue to learn about 
 machine learning, statistics, and mathematics and how to present discoveries with data.

> I always strive to optimize delivery and generate visual wealth through graphics and dashboards (data visualization), combining knowledge of aesthetics and graphic representation developed during my studies in Architecture.

e-mail: emiliobertholdoneto@gmail.com 
telephone and whatsapp - +5511939280397

projects.title: Professor -  Urban development and planning
projects.description:
I work for a high-performance company in the preparation of professionals for the job market, with more than 70 years of activity in the country and a high impact on labor qualification.

As a teacher, I focus on courses in the areas of Architecture, Urbanism, Landscaping, and Interior Design.

-> I develop research related to the production of products for the market and research of low-cost technologies for food production.

-> I work with research on upcycling and sustainable furniture production, in order to contribute to making design accessible to everyone.

-> As a teacher and architect, I have developed skills for teamwork, mediation, and conflict management, as well as more assertive processes for feedback and performance evaluation.

-> I work with active methodologies, always focused on empowering students to work in the job market by developing hard and soft skills.

-> I have acquired good skills for preparation and management of teams in multidisciplinary projects due to the need for interaction between various areas of activity.

I work in a high-performance company that prepares professionals for the job market with over 70 years of experience in the country and a high impact on workforce qualification.

-> I conduct research related to product production for the market and low-cost technologies for food production.

-> I coordinate a research group on upcycling furniture production and sustainable design to contribute to making design accessible to everyone.

profile_positions.title: Data Analyst Researcher - Urban development and Real Estate

profile_positions.description:
The Kroton Group is the largest educational company in the country in terms of number of students and courses offered per year, proving to be a high-performance company in the qualification of workers with higher education. During my time at the company, I participated in and coordinated:

-> Coordinated working groups for analysis of urban indicators, mapping of areas with high potential for 
 real estate production and proposal for rehabilitation of public areas;

-> Research on the construction of urban scenarios based on municipal data with GIS;

-> I developed skills for teamwork, mediation and conflict management, more assertive processes for 
 feedback and performance evaluation.

-> I worked with active and agile methodologies for project development and information socialization, 
 always aimed at empowering group members by developing hard and soft skills.
profile_positions.title: Project manager and Urban Researcher - Urban development and Real Estate

company.name: IPIU - Instituto de Pesquisa e Inovação em Urbanismo

profile_positions.company: IPIU - Instituto de Pesquisa e Inovação em Urbanismo
profile_positions.description:
IPIU is a research institution specializing in urbanism and real estate, created as a social counterpart by a group of companies in the real estate industry. It was the winner of one of the most prestigious awards in the real estate sector in the urban development category with the ComViva project.

-> I participated in coordinating and designing the collaborative management methodology of the ComViva land developments. It is an open development project with high integration into the existing urban network. It is managed by the community with the help of digital technologies. The project generated a replicable methodology for community management, which is highly innovative in the country and was the main reason for winning the Master Imobiliário award.

-> I worked as a research and development coordinator in the field of Architecture and Urbanism, focusing on urban regeneration processes and land use analysis, especially in the development of qualitative and quantitative analysis methodologies.

-> I coordinated multidisciplinary teams in collecting quantitative research for the collection and analysis of urban public data for insight management and qualitative field research projects using focus groups, interviews, and participant observation to understand community development processes.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - Urban Research Coordinator

profile_positions.company: IPIU - Instituto de Pesquisa e Inovação em Urbanismo
profile_positions.description:
IPIU is a research institution specialized in urbanism and real estate, created with the social counterpart of a group of real estate companies.

-> I participated in social projects to raise funds called "Furgão Social" with a focus on taking culture in a mobile way to underserved areas in the city of São Paulo.

As a researcher, I focus on understanding urban issues and implementing housing developments.

-> Analysis of urban legislation, especially the Master Plan and Land Use and Occupation (Zoning).

-> Analysis of indicators for the implementation of social projects.

-> Analysis of projects with local impact.

-> Design of indicators and rules for the Master Plan.

-> Geoprocessing and spatial data analysis.

-> Field research and on-site analysis.

-> Preparation of materials for lectures and data visualization.
profile_positions.title: Data analyst Researcher - Urban affairs

profile_positions.description:
The Mackenzie Presbyterian University is a Brazilian educational institution with over 148 years of experience in the market, dedicated to training high-performance professionals and problem solvers, always with a focus on innovation.

My master's dissertation was classified among the top 5% most relevant and innovative of the biennium among the researches defended at the institution, with a broad concern to analyze public policies for low-cost technology development in the municipality of São Paulo, especially focused on urban mobility and digital production (FABLAB).

The research relied on quantitative data provided by the Municipal Public Authority and quantitative analysis for the construction of indicators with high potential to represent metrics of efficiency of the municipal technology production policy at the level of urban governance.

The research is strongly focused on the social issue of low-cost technology production to assist underprivileged communities.

Results:
Top 5% master thesis of the biennium.
profile_positions.title: Urban Researcher - Innovation and Low-cost technologies

profile_positions.description:
During my trainee period, Anhembi Morumbi was part of Laureate Group, an important American holding company with eight institutions throughout Brazil and present in over 10 countries, strongly working towards access to quality higher education.

-> I participated in projects that were of great help to various areas of the company, such as:

-- Academic Laureate points calculation project for the unit I worked in and several other institutions
of the group, improving student engagement, especially those enrolled in online courses;

-- KPIs dashboard project for the sales area of the institution, developing from data source to
dashboard production with the help of Power BI (Qlikview), improving active sales management
process;

-- KPI optimization project for employee and bonus management, especially for the granting of
promotions and bonuses for teachers, allowing the automation of internal processes;

-- I participated in focus group processes to understand brand visibility;

-- I assisted in the process of restructuring the visual identity of the campuses, improving student
engagement.

-> Participating in the trainee program at the beginning of my career allowed me to mature my understanding of business operations and demands, especially through the job rotation methodology and project development, allowing me to develop various skills such as:

-- Preparation of reports on strengths and weaknesses in different business areas.

-- Development of improvement project suggestions for different business areas.

-- Interlocution between different company departments.

-- Creation of presentations for management.

-- Development of graphs and infographics for results presentation.

-- Analysis and understanding of educational legislation.

-- Reading and analysis of KPIs.
profile_positions.title: Trainee - Acadêmico

volunteer_experiences.description: Participation in the design, execution, and management process of the urban space revitalization project in the municipality of São Bernardo do Campo.

company.name: IPIU - Instituto de Pesquisa e Inovação em Urbanismo

volunteer_experiences.description:
Participation in the "furgão social" project as a way of bringing culture to more marginalized areas of the city of São Paulo.

Cycle of lectures for municipal public officials in the cities of POA, Miriporã, and Ferraz de Vasconcelos, near the city of São Paulo, aimed at equipping local governments with techniques for citizen initiatives and popular engagement. The lecture series aimed to make participatory urban development processes more efficient, democratic, and conscientious for the population.

Research and development of a product that enables low-cost urban gardening. The project intends to construct a cultivation system using digital printing as a means of production.

After the research is tested and validated, it will be made available to the general public to enable the production of organic food at home, expand access to quality food at low cost for low-income populations, and increase food awareness for families.
